name: bitwarden
description: Bitwarden is a secure, open-source password manager with browser, mobile, and desktop clients. It allows self-hosted password vaults, secure sharing, autofill, and zero-knowledge encryption with sync across devices.
features: Password Management: Securely store unlimited passwords with zero-knowledge encryption. Complete security.
Cross-Platform: Browser extensions, mobile apps, and desktop clients. Access everywhere.
Auto-Fill: Automatically fill login credentials on websites and apps. Seamless experience.
Secure Sharing: Share passwords and sensitive data with trusted contacts. Controlled access.
Two-Factor Auth: Add extra security layer with 2FA support. Enhanced protection.
Password Generator: Create strong, unique passwords automatically. Never reuse passwords.
Self-Hosted: Run your own vault for complete data ownership. Maximum privacy.
Sync Across Devices: Keep passwords updated on all your devices. Always in sync.
